meanings.definition: The measurement of the reflection of waves or particles.
meanings.sent1: Reflectometry helps scientists understand how waves bounce back.
meanings.sent2: The reflectometry of waves in the ocean can reveal hidden structures.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use reflectometry to see if my cat's meows bounced off the walls.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a reflectometry, bouncing joy back to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The reflectometry of the mirror made the room seem brighter and more spacious.

meanings.sent2: Reflectometry is crucial in understanding how sonar works underwater.
